Class StraightLineEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
      • StraightLineEnemy

  • public class StraightLineEnemy
extends Enemy
    This is a SmartTargetingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that is able to only move in a straight line, either horizontally or vertically.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 30/11/19.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Szymon Grzech (988065)

    • Method Detail

      • image

        public javafx.scene.image.Image image(java.lang.String IMAGE_FOLDER)

      • move

        public void move(Character ch,
                 Cell[][] map)
        This method moves the enemy by 1 block in either vertical or horizontal direction, if there is a wall or a collectible or a door in front of the enemy, then the enemy will bounce and walk in the opposite direction.
        Specified by:
        move in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        ch - the Character, used to get the characters coordinates and is used to kill the character if they are on the same coordinates.
        map - a 2D array of Cells on which the enemies move around.
